name: Monster Compendium - About Monster Materials
description:
"You want materials, but you can't slay a single thing... There must be hunters thinking this right now. This report is aimed at these hunters, and in this edition, we will cover the monster materials..."
A hunting life magazine that covers the monster materials. Full of useful informations.

name: Tools of the Trade - Sword and Shield
description:
"Alright, I'm a hunter... But now what weapon should I be using...?! There must be hunters thinking this right now. In this lecture, we will give these worried hunters a special report on sword and shield..."
A hunting life magazine that covers the usage of sword and shields. Full of useful informations.

name: Tools of the Trade - Bowgun Usage
description:
"I, the 'legendary gunner', am using this manuscript to record everything for those aiming to become gunners in the generations to come. It will cover all matters related to gunners, from the basics to the advanced..."
A hunting life magazine that covers the usage of bowguns. Full of useful informations.
